text: Ðis syndon þa gemæro to ðeouecan hylle.
Ærest owandes forda eastweard olluncges stete.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeð to þære hegce olluncges ðære hegge<../images/tbar.gif>in lawern.
Up be lawern<../images/tbar.gif>swa suðen to ðæm forda.
Ofer ðæm forda ollunc stræte þæt on butan þa cotu<../images/tbar.gif>swa on ælles burnan.
Olluncges burnan<../images/tbar.gif>swa on ðæt sic, olluncges sices<../images/tbar.gif>swa wið.
Suþan ðæm more up bi ðæm æcerhege to ðære stræt, olluncges stræt<../images/tbar.gif>swa on þa hegce.
Olluncges ðære hegce norðweard þæt on ða stræt.
Olluncges stræte eastweard,<../images/tbar.gif>swa on ðone hyl.
Olluncges hegce<../images/tbar.gif>swa on lawern, olluncges streames<../images/tbar.gif>swa norðen in ðone ford.
And ða þreo æcras on þæm hylle foran on easthalfe lawern & on norðhealfe stræte.
Ælfweard wæs se forma man & nu hit stant his dohtor on handa & heo is se oðer man.
